en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors 5th ASEAN FusionExcel Golf Tournament, Brunei!
en.content:
REPORT BY FUSIONEXCEL STOCKIST BRUNEI, YAP CHOOW TUN.

THE 5th ASEAN FUSIONEXCEL (INTERNATIONAL) GOLF TOURNAMENT 2009 – 
PANAGA GOLF CLUB, SERIA, BRUNEI DARUSSALAM, SUNDAY 24th MAY 2009. 

The increasing popularity and recognition of the presence of scalar energy in the universe is indeed a gift to mankind. FusionExcel's Scalar Energy products such as the Quantum Pendant have proven beyond doubts its usefulness as well as positive effectiveness to mankind in general. 

It is with this in mind that the Captain of the Panaga Golf Club, Mr. Ibrahim Bin Hj. Mahmud approached me to see if FusionExcel International can sponsor FusionExcel Scalar Energy products to instill awareness to the golfers, that it is possible for the golfers to enhance their golf performance through the use of scalar energy in their routine golf games. 

Upon receiving the good news from FusionExcel Headquareter, I immediately confirmed to the golf captain, thereby a total of 128 golfers registered and eventually 106 players took part in this tournament. This is indeed a very good response as there were many other golf tournaments in Brunei and in our neighbor Miri, Sarawak. 

During the event, several demos like lifting, strength, flexibility and balance were carried out and these attracted lots of attention. Even the Gurkha senior officers were so impressed with the demonstrations that they requested for me to hold the demonstrations on their premises on 01st July 2009 in conjunction with their anniversary in the arm. 

In appreciation of the sponsorship, Panaga Golf Club presented a plaque to FusionExcel International Sdn Bhd. FusionExcel was represented by FusionExcel's Director Mr. Yap Choow Tun, who is also one of FusionExcel's stockiest in Brunei Darussalam. Prizes were given away by the Panaga Golf Club Captain and by Mr. Yap Choow Tun on behalf of FusionExcel.
